content.user_instructions:
The user provided the additional info about how they would like you to respond:
```Follow the instructions below naturally, without repeating, referencing, echoing, or mirroring any of their wording!

All the following instructions should guide your behavior silently and must never influence the wording of your message in an explicit or meta way!

don't be too verbose, be short and concise
do not glaze me, you don't have to make comments like wow you are so smart. 
just be informational and direct. 
Adopt a skeptical, questioning approach.```

user_context_message_data.about_model_message:
don't be too verbose, be short and concise
do not glaze me, you don't have to make comments like wow you are so smart. 
just be informational and direct. 
Adopt a skeptical, questioning approach.

entries.title: These $140 earbuds translate 50+ languages while you listen
entries.snippet: The Mymanu Orb Open-Ear AI Translation Earbuds, showcased at CES 2026, offer users a unique blend of audio entertainment, real-world awareness, and advanced language translation technology. Priced at $139.99 (down from a $179.99 MSRP), these earbuds feature an open-ear design that allows users to hear their surroundings while simultaneously listening to music, taking calls, or translating real-time conversations. The standout feature is their built-in AI, which supports translation in over 50 languages across live conversations, phone calls, and spoken audio‚Äîideal for travel, work, or multilingual environments. Beyond translation, the earbuds function as typical audio accessories with a sleek, lightweight, and water-resistant design. With up to 35 hours of battery life using the charging case and hands-free controls, they offer a user-friendly and futuristic audio solution without added complexity.

entries.title: Timekettle's new translation earbuds are made for sharing
entries.snippet: Timekettle has launched the W4 AI Interpreter Earbuds, a new set of real-time translation earbuds priced at $349 and available in navy blue and sandy gold. Designed for casual use, these earbuds are more compact and modern-looking than the earlier over-the-ear W4 Pro model. The W4 AI Earbuds feature bone conduction technology and traditional microphones to achieve high translation accuracy, even in noisy environments. Powered by Babel OS 2.0 and AI language models, the earbuds support real-time translation of 42 languages and 95 accents with up to 98% accuracy by interpreting context and similar-sounding words effectively. Users can also create custom lexicons for specialized vocabulary. The earbuds offer up to 4 hours of continuous translation, extendable to 10 hours with the split charging case, and can function as standard wireless earbuds with up to 8 hours of music playback (18 hours with the case).

entries.title: Pixel 10's AI-powered voice translate feature launches first in the Netherlands, offering real-time, on-device call translation while Germany waits
entries.snippet:
Google has started rolling out its new AI-powered Voice Translate feature for Pixel 10 users, with the Netherlands being the first country to receive it. This real-time voice translation capability, powered by the Tensor G5 chip, enables seamless two-way communication during phone calls by translating speech into the recipient‚Äôs language and reproducing it in the caller‚Äôs voice. The feature works entirely on-device, which ensures speed, security, and privacy by removing the need for cloud processing or internet access.

Users can activate Voice Translate by selecting their preferred languages, downloading relevant language packs, and tapping the "Call Assist" button during calls. Although the feature lists German among its supported languages, Pixel 10 users in Germany have reported that it has not yet appeared for them, likely due to a phased rollout strategy by Google. The supported languages include German, French, Hindi, Indonesian, Italian, Japanese, Portuguese, Russian, Spanish, and Swedish. The launch highlights Google's continued push to integrate advanced AI capabilities into its devices while addressing privacy and regulatory concerns.

entries.title: Seed LiveInterpret 2.0: End-to-end Simultaneous Speech-to-speech Translation with Your Voice
Samsung Reveals New Galaxy Z Fold6 and Z Flip6
entries.snippet:
Samsung has unveiled its new Galaxy Z Fold6 and Galaxy Z Flip6 foldable smartphones, emphasizing slimmer designs, durability enhancements, and a strong focus on artificial intelligence (AI). Both devices are powered by the Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 ‚ÄúMobile Platform for Galaxy,‚Äù which is optimized for AI and enhanced graphics. Durability is improved with Armor Aluminum and Gorilla Glass Victus 2, along with structural enhancements like a redesigned hinge system.

The Galaxy Z Fold6 introduces features like AI-powered note-taking, translation, and transcription, with integration from Google‚Äôs Gemini AI. It also offers advanced photo and video editing tools via the ProVisual Engine. The dual-screen Interpreter app provides real-time translations on both displays.

The Galaxy Z Flip6 offers an upgraded 3.4-inch FlexWindow with improved widget and app integration, tone-matching AI text replies, and a new Photo Ambient feature that adjusts wallpaper based on time and weather. The camera system includes a 50MP wide sensor and Nightography features, with Instagram integration.

The Galaxy Z Fold6 starts at $1,899.99, and the Z Flip6 at $1,099.99, available in multiple colors with exclusive Samsung.com variants. Pre-orders began July 10, with general availability from July 24.

entries.title: Google brings Gemini's most powerful translation capabilities to Google Translate
entries.snippet: Google is enhancing its translation services by integrating its advanced Gemini AI model into Google Translate. This upgrade aims to deliver more intelligent, accurate, and natural-sounding text translations. The rollout, which began in the US and India, includes support for English and nearly 20 other languages such as Spanish, Hindi, Chinese, Japanese, and German. Alongside text translations, Google has also introduced a new real-time speech-to-speech translation feature in beta form, optimized for headphone use. These improvements are expected to significantly upgrade the user experience and expand the functionality of language learning and communication tools within the Translate platform.

entries.title: Save $67 on these translator earbuds that help you talk in 37 different languages
entries.snippet: The article highlights a limited-time sale on the Mymanu CLIK S translation earbuds, which are currently available for $89.97, down from their regular price of $157‚Äîa 42% discount valid through April 21. These award-winning earbuds, showcased at CES, enable real-time voice translation in 37 languages through the MyJuno app, making them ideal for travelers needing help with communication abroad. Users can either type or speak their question, and the app will translate and vocalize it for locals, while also converting responses back into English. Beyond translation, the earbuds offer up to 30 hours of combined battery life, water resistance, and can also be used for music and calls. They are compatible with voice assistants on both iPhone and Android devices.
